socialSecurityDeathIndex

Class MySqlDatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • socialSecurityDeathIndex.DatabaseConnection
      • socialSecurityDeathIndex.MySqlDatabaseConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabaseConnection

    public final class MySqlDatabaseConnection
extends DatabaseConnection
    Makes a connection to a MySQL database, using Oracle's com.mysql.jdbc.Driver driver.
    Author:
    Jim Vlcek

        public void ConnectToDatabase(int iPort)
                       throws DbConnectionException,
                              java.sql.SQLException
        Instantiates the com.mysql.jdbc.Driver driver, and attempts to make a connection to the remote MySQL database
        Specified by:
        ConnectToDatabase in class DatabaseConnection
        Parameters:
        iPort - the IP port on which the database server is listening
        Throws:
        DbConnectionException - if the required driver class cannot be instantiated
        java.sql.SQLException - if an SQL error occurs when connecting to the remote database
